title: A special Q&A Thursday: How to prepare for the market ahead
itunes:title: A special Q&A Thursday: How to prepare for the market ahead
description: We're changing up the format a bit today…  Instead of the usual interview, I’m hosting a Q&A session. (By the time you get this, I’ll be on a plane to Vegas to celebrate my wife's birthday.) Today’s show covers a wide range of topics, including:  Is the market pricing in enough future rate hikes? [1:15] What equity risk premium (ERP) is—and why it spells trouble for stocks [4:30] How to make massive profits during a market crash [14:00] Why I thought Goldman's earnings were terrible [16:05] Are long field goals ruining the NFL? [22:30] Do I ever re-recommend old stock picks? [25:18]  Enjoyed this episode?
